name: Cassandra
description: A quick reference of Apache's Cassandra database

KEYSPACE.key: CREATE KEYSPACE keyspace_name WITH DURABLE_WRITES = ( true | false )
KEYSPACE.val: Define a new keyspace and its replica placement strategy
Connect the client session to a keyspace.

KEYSPACE.key: ALTER KEYSPACE keyspace_name WITH REPLICATION = map | ( WITH DURABLE_WRITES = ( true | false )) AND ( DURABLE_WRITES = ( true | false))
KEYSPACE.val: Change property values of a keyspace

USER.key: CREATE USER user_name WITH PASSWORD 'password' ( NOSUPERUSER | SUPERUSER )
ALTER USER user_name WITH PASSWORD 'password' ( NOSUPERUSER | SUPERUSER )
LIST ALL PERMISSIONS ON user_name NORECURSIVE
USER.val: List permissions granted to a user
List existing users and their superuser status

TABLE.val: Modify the column metadata of a table

TABLE.key: SELECT select_expression FROM table_name WHERE relation AND relation ... ORDER BY ( clustering_column ( ASC | DESC )...) LIMIT n ALLOW FILTERING
TABLE.val: Retrieve data from a Cassandra table

TABLE.key: UPDATE table_name USING option AND option SET assignment, assignment, ... WHERE row_specification
DELETE column_name  FROM table_name USING TIMESTAMP integer WHERE row_specification
TABLE.val: Removes entire rows or one or more columns from one or more rows
Remove all data from a table

TABLE.key: INSERT INTO table_name ( column_name, column_name...) VALUES ( value, value ... ) USING option AND option
TABLE.val: Add or update columns. option is one of: TIMESTAMP microseconds, TTL seconds

INDEX.key: CREATE CUSTOM INDEX index_name ON table_name ( column_name ) (USING class_name) (WITH OPTIONS = map)
INDEX.val: Define a new index on a single column of a table
